author: andschwa
body:
- [x] tag last merge
- [x] merge new changes
- [x] tag original version for diffing

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
@vors The `source-depot` branch now points to the commit with the _original_ SD files (not to be confused with the cherry-pick that "merges" the changes).

Thus, `git diff source-depot..master -- src` shows the changes made in PowerShell that are not in Source Depot.

title: Merge SD changes
